sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react" import { SidebarContent } from "./SidebarContent" import { Offcanvas } from 'bootstrap' const Sidebar = (props) => { const [collapseToggle, setCollapseToggle] = useState(false) const sideBarRef = useRef() useEffect(() => { const sidebarOffcanvas = sideBarRef.current console.log(sidebarOffcanvas.className) console.log(collapseToggle) const offcanvasElement = new Offcanvas(sidebarOffcanvas, { toggle: false }) console.log(offcanvasElement) collapseToggle === true ? offcanvasElement.show() : offcanvasElement.hide() console.log(sidebarOffcanvas.className) console.log(offcanvasElement) }) const handleClick = (event) => { const listEl = event.currentTarget const activeEl = document.querySelector(".list-color-modified-active") activeEl.className = "rounded list-group-item list-group-item-action list-color-modified link-hover-mod" listEl.className = "border border-0 list-group-item list-group-item-action list-color-modified-active link-hover-mod" props.update(event.target.textContent) setCollapseToggle(false) } return ( <>
) } export default Sidebar
